data.body: What is the difference between COPY and ADD commands in Dockerfile?
data.answer: COPY only supports basic copying of local files into the container, while ADD has additional features like URL support and tar auto-extraction. COPY is preferred for simple file copying operations.

key_points.answer: COPY supports basic file copying only
ADD has URL and tar extraction features
COPY is preferred for simple operations

What are the main differences between Docker and virtual machines?

options.text: Docker uses containerization while VMs use hardware virtualization
VMs use less resources than Docker
